name: Lab Escape (Eva Abollivier, Yacuzi)
description:
You have to escape, and fast!

Velocio is a poor slime that was kept in a laboratory for years by scientist. But today is the day they finally get out of here! if they can outrun the security system that is...


Rules

In each level, you have one second to reach the exit before being shot down by the security system's laser.


Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Escape - Quit the game

Credits

Nicolas Noël - Game design, code, sound
Eva Abollivier - Game design, art


This game was made in 48 hours for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam.
